relation: Ronan casts a spell that increases damage by 10%, defense by 6%, and gives a shield that blocks one hit for nearby party members as well as himself for 25 seconds. The damage increase effect is stackable up to 5 times.
Ronan drops three meteor onto him by default, yet the meteors can be aimed, creating havoc over a short or wide area at Ronan's desire.

Ronan fires two very slow moving ice orbs that expands on impact, trapping anyone within the frosty explosion. (Note: Contrary to its appearance, Lunatic Force actually stuns for a lengthy time, not freezes.)
Ronan casts a glyph behind him that summons several ethereal blades and a larger blade in the center of the glyph which fly horizontally across the screen, piercing all enemies in their path.
Ronan conjures Erudon's Blade, and then he swings the blade downwards, cleaving everything in front of him.
